channel.title: Raddest Pow3r Cutter!
channel.description:
Hey!, I'm back and updated it a lot. It's my brand new Pow3r Cutter! It's not so good it has some antirandoms and a decent antiban. Please post comments and suggestions (all abusive posts will be reported). I'm not that good at scripting. I had no help whats so ever making this script. Kane has helped me a little bit with just learning the basics of scripting. So please post all of your comments and pointers. The attachment is at the bottom of my post. You must be logged on to see the attachment ;)
~Slinkyman24~

item.title: Raddest Pow3r Cutter!
item.dc:creator: @junkj junkj
item.description:
@junkj wrote:

[code]{ RRRRRRRRRRR R
RR R DDDDDDDDDD
RR R A DD DD
RR R A A DD DD
RR R A A DD DD
RRRRRRRRRRRR A A DD DD
RR RR A A DD DD
RR RR AAAAAAAAAAA DD DD
RR RR A A DD DD
RR RR A A DD DD
RR RR A A DD DD
RR RR A A DDDDDDDDDDD
1.Have axe in first inv slot
2.Set Colors
3.Declare players
4.Set const.
5.Run and Enjoy autoing!
}

program Pow3rCutt3r;

{.include SRL/SRL.scar}
{.include SRL/SRL/Skill/Woodcutting.scar}

const
Username =‘omfgowned’;//your username here!
Password =‘omfgowned’;//Your password here!
tree_color1 =1;//tree color one
tree_color2 =1;//tree color 2
axe=1; //1=equiped 2=first slot inventory

procedure Setup;
begin
setupsrl;
ActivateClient;
ClearDebug;
end;

procedure chop;
begin
findaxeheadcolor;
if(findcolorspiral(x,y,tree_color1,5,5,315,284))or
(findcolorspiral(x,y,tree_color2,5,5,315,284))then
mmouse(x,y,3,3)
begin
if(isuptextmulti(‘chop’,‘down’,‘op do’))then
mouse(x,y,3,3, true)
end;
end;

procedure dropdropdrop;
begin
if(axe=1)then
begin
if(invfull)then
dropall;
end else
begin
if(axe=2)then
begin
if(invfull)then
dropto(2,28)
end;
end;
end;

Procedure Find_mod;
begin
if(findmod)then
logout;
writeln(‘found a mod!!’);
end;

Procedure Find_Randoms;
begin
fixchat;
FindNormalRandoms;
end;

Procedure noban;
begin
Boredhuman;
RandomRclick;
antiban;
pickupmouse;
AlmostLogout;
end;

Procedure Randoms_Report;
begin
SRLRandomsReport;
end;

Procedure Thanks;
begin
Writeln(‘Thank You for using the most Rad script ever!’)
Writeln(‘This is a very bad script so i wont be suprised if you dont use it’)
Writeln(‘Please comment with suggestions and stuff all abusive posts will be reported’)
Writeln(‘Thanks again!’)
end;

begin
setup;
repeat
dropdropdrop;
Find_mod;
chop;
noban;
Randoms_Report;
Find_Randoms;
until(false)
end.
[/code]

Ok i say you had alot of errors that i forgot you had.

First off,when you copy stuff from the srl manual,copy the procedure or function not the words in paranthese,the words in paranthese means that you need a xy some coords or maybe colors,
Then you had string(pink words) errors in the const

when you put words in the const like…

something=yoyoyoy;

that yoyoyoy needs some " ’ " after and before it.with numbers you dont need to.

Also a drop procedure in a chop procedure, use 2 diffrent procedures for one command.

Finally in the main loop(all the way at the bottom) that end; needs to be a end. because end; ends a procedure and end. ends the whole script.

Also to go with that always after a repeat needs to have a until,i took it out in your chopping procedure because it didnt look right.
So i put it in your main loop which is the same thing but better!

Any questions about the changes i made?
PM ME!

Read full topic
